member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DATA_FRAME
member.summary: Using the information from IOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY, an application can create an RPMB frame to perform one of the following actions: • Program Authentication Key • Query RPMB Write Counter • Authenticated Write • Authenticated Read • Authenticated Device Configuration Write • Authenticated Device Configuration Read

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DATA_FRAME.KeyOrMAC
member.summary: Either the key to be programmed or the MAC authenticating this frame or series of frames.

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DATA_FRAME.Nonce
member.summary: Random 128-bit number generated by host. Only required for reads.

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DATA_FRAME.Address
member.summary: The half-sector address to operate on.

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DATA_FRAME.BlockCount
member.summary: The count of half-sector blocks to read/write.

member.name: STORAGE_RPMB_DATA_FRAME.RequestOrResponseType
member.summary: The type of request or response.
